topic.title: EMS Medications Administered Section - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10439)/@code="67849-0" Medications Administered Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10440)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title = "Medications Administered Section" (CONF:10442)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10443)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] substanceAdministration (CONF:10444)
This substanceAdministration SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SBADM" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:10445)
This substanceAdministration MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:10448)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.03 negative action values If a substance is recorded as not given, it shall be recorded with a negationInd =True, and with an entryRelationship such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RSON" Has reason (CodeSystem: HL7ActRelationshipType 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002) SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True SHALL contain exactly one /Observation with code drawn from 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.42 Medication omission reason and value = "Assertion."
This substanceAdministration SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] doseQuantity (CONF:10446)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.05, 06
This substanceAdministration SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10447)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.01
This substanceAdministration SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] routeCode (CONF:10450), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet MedicationAdministeredRoute 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.43 STATIC (CONF:10449)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.04
This substanceAdministration MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10451)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10458)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode (CONF:10460)/@code="RSON" Reason (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) (CONF:10459)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10461)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" Assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:10462)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10463), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet MedicationNotGivenReason 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.92 STATIC (CONF:10464)
This substanceAdministration SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consumable (CONF:10452)
This consumable SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedProduct (CONF:10465)
This manufacturedProduct SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedLabeledDrug (CONF:10466)
This manufacturedLabeledDrug SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.88 RxNorm) (CONF:10467)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.03
This substanceAdministration SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10453)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10468)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10469)/@code="67540-5" Response to medication (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10470)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet PatientConditionChange 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.59 STATIC (CONF:10471)
This substanceAdministration SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship (CONF:10454)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10472)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10473)/@code="67541-3" Medication complication (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10474)
This observation SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type CD (CONF:10475), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet MedicationComplication 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.45 STATIC (CONF:10476)
This substanceAdministration SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10455)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10477)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.02
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10478)/@code="67539-7" Prior administration (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10479)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10480)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.02
This substanceAdministration MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:10456)
This participation is required if the medication is administered by the crew; i.e., if EMSMedicationPriorAdministrationObservation is FALSE.
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole (CONF:10481)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10482), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.46 STATIC (CONF:10483)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.10
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:10484)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.09
This participation is required if the medication is administered by the crew; i.e., if EMSMedicationPriorAdministrationObservation is FALSE.
This substanceAdministration MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10457)
This relationship is required if the medication is administered by the crew; i.e., if EMSMedicationPriorAdministrationObservation is FALSE.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] act (CONF:10485)
This act SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode (CONF:10486)/@code="INFRM" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:10487)
This act SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet MedicationAuthorizationType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.47 STATIC (CONF:10488)
This relationship is required if the medication is administered by the crew; i.e., if EMSMedicationPriorAdministrationObservation is FALSE.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10439)/@code="67849-0" Medications Administered Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10440)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title = "Medications Administered Section" (CONF:10442)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10443)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] substanceAdministration (CONF:10444)
This substanceAdministration SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SBADM" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:10445)
This substanceAdministration MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:10448)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.03 negative action values If a substance is recorded as not given, it shall be recorded with a negationInd =True, and with an entryRelationship such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RSON" Has reason (CodeSystem: HL7ActRelationshipType 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002) SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True SHALL contain exactly one /Observation with code drawn from 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.42 Medication omission reason and value = "Assertion."
This substanceAdministration SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] doseQuantity (CONF:10446)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.05, 06
This substanceAdministration SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10447)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.01
This substanceAdministration SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] routeCode (CONF:10450), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet MedicationAdministeredRoute 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.43 STATIC (CONF:10449)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.04
This substanceAdministration MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10451)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10458)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode (CONF:10460)/@code="RSON" Reason (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) (CONF:10459)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10461)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" Assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:10462)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10463), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet MedicationNotGivenReason 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.92 STATIC (CONF:10464)
This substanceAdministration SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consumable (CONF:10452)
This consumable SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedProduct (CONF:10465)
This manufacturedProduct SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedLabeledDrug (CONF:10466)
This manufacturedLabeledDrug SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.88 RxNorm) (CONF:10467)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.03
This substanceAdministration SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10453)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10468)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10469)/@code="67540-5" Response to medication (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10470)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet PatientConditionChange 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.59 STATIC (CONF:10471)
This substanceAdministration SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship (CONF:10454)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10472)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10473)/@code="67541-3" Medication complication (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10474)
This observation SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type CD (CONF:10475), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet MedicationComplication 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.45 STATIC (CONF:10476)
This substanceAdministration SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10455)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10477)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.02
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10478)/@code="67539-7" Prior administration (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10479)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10480)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.02
This substanceAdministration MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:10456)
This participation is required if the medication is administered by the crew; i.e., if EMSMedicationPriorAdministrationObservation is FALSE.
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole (CONF:10481)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10482), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.46 STATIC (CONF:10483)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.10
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:10484)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.09
This participation is required if the medication is administered by the crew; i.e., if EMSMedicationPriorAdministrationObservation is FALSE.
This substanceAdministration MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10457)
This relationship is required if the medication is administered by the crew; i.e., if EMSMedicationPriorAdministrationObservation is FALSE.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] act (CONF:10485)
This act SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode (CONF:10486)/@code="INFRM" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:10487)
This act SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet MedicationAuthorizationType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.47 STATIC (CONF:10488)
This relationship is required if the medication is administered by the crew; i.e., if EMSMedicationPriorAdministrationObservation is FALSE.

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <section xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.18"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1872164892"/> <code code="67849-0" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Medications Administered Section"/> <title>Medications Administered Section</title> <text/> <entry> <substanceAdministration classCode="SBADM"> <effectiveTime value="20120709"/> <routeCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC"/> <doseQuantity/> <consumable/> <participant/> <entryRelationship typeCode="RSON" inversionInd="true"/> <entryRelationship/> <entryRelationship/> <entryRelationship/> <entryRelationship/> </substanceAdministration> </entry> </section>
